website_summaries.verdict: Adventurers generally liked the MQM Ace for its lightness, comfiness and excellent arch support. Its breathable mesh upper and surface traction were also appreciated by buyers. On the other hand, there were those who found the fit too narrow. All in all, the Merrell MQM Ace is a superb low-top hiker that offers a set of trail-centric features specific for summer excursions.
pros: Plenty of users found a favorably lightweight hiking shoe in the Merrell MQM Ace
According to the majority, it delivered sufficient arch support
Based on a lot of consumer reviews, the MQM Ace’s comfort was impressive
Its breathability left a great impression on a bunch of outdoor enthusiasts
The hiking shoe’s performance on challenging ground conditions was lauded by the minority
Several wearers reported that this Merrell product virtually had no break-in period
cons: A few buyers felt let down by the Merrell MQM Ace’s constraining fit

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for Office Casual
customer_reviews.text: Merrell run slightly larger, which I need. Breathable and good aesthetics were main reasons beyond fit. I search the net for hours as I have there is a very limited selection of these in black without white soles. Those that are available are all black. I don't work in a restaurant. I work in a nice office.
customer_reviews.author: a_discriminating_guy

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Cycle
customer_reviews.text: This shoe looks and feels great, but fall apart after 4 months. It is complete trash. It is way overpriced for a shoe that can't even last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe designed for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! This is my 2nd pair of the MQM ACE hiking shoe. So comfortable. They are great for walking or hiking. The Vibram sole gives a cushy yet stable ride with great traction. The lace-up design allows for a secure yet adjustable fit. I'm good for awhile with these awesome shoes. And they look great! You need to check these out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size Down 1/2-1 when ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe comfortable and stylish. BUT size 1/2 to 1to large. I’ve always and currently wear a size 8 this feels like a 9 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair!
customer_reviews.text: Own several pairs of Merrell shoes, these are by far my favorite. Not as heavy as others and wear well.
customer_reviews.author: SDJ50504

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and comfortable shoe - disappointing condition x2
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes themselves - pretty frustrated with condition of shoes from Zappos. 1st pair I ordered had a stain so returned. 2nd pair had clearly been warm as they had scuff marks on parts of the shoes and weren’t brand new. Decided to keep second pair but will ensure to order from future directly from Merrell.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I’ve owned. Only wear Merrell and/or Salomon
customer_reviews.author: Agreen

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have foot issues so I need something comfortable, wore them to work today and I’m now going to order a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Eggleton

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes daily. They are comfortable and I will probably buy another pair when they are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus Mcpheron

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit like I like.
customer_reviews.text: Same name as blue mqm. Do not fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Menan

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with ankle/foot problems
customer_reviews.text: The extra support on the heel is wonderful! I am a regular walker but had to cut back due to injury. The support from these shoes was so good that I even stopped wearing my brace.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crabb

product_meta.title: Merrell MQM Ace Men's UK
product_meta.description: Inspired by athletes and made for you, this hybrid packs all the technology needed for moving quickly in the mountains into one fast, protective shoe. FEATURES Engineered mesh and TPU upper Lace-to-toe lacing for secure fit Floating Hypercage for lightweight support M Select FRESH antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odor Breathable mesh lining Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured insole for flexible support Compression molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort FLEXconnect dual-directional flex-grooves in EVA midsole for agility and stability TrailProtect rock plate protects feet from underfoot debris Vibram Megagrip 4 mm lug depth Weight: 1lb 8oz / 684g
feature_bullets: M Select FRESH antimicrobial agents reduces shoe odor
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
